1.q_string: If \(\overrightarrow{ a }=4 \hat{ i }+6 \hat{ j }\) and \(\overrightarrow{ b }=3 \hat{ j }+4 \hat{ k }\), then the vector form of the component of \(\vec{a}\) along \(\vec{b}\) is:
